pullRequest.title: XML option to show where a flag will respawn at next.
pullRequest.bodyText:
This change is intended to help king of the flag play better (ie desert sanctuary). With this change, as soon as the flag is picked up, if show-respawn-on-pickup="true", it will say in chat where the flag will respawn at next.
I added the attribute show-respawn-on-pickup to . It defaults to false. Also, the chosen post must have a name in order for the chat message to display.
Signed-off-by: mrcookie

beforeCommit.message:
change translation key to better name

Signed-off-by: mrcookie <athertonmook@gmail.com>

afterCommit.message:
Added an xml option to show what post the flag will respawn to next. This change is intended to help KoTF play better.

Signed-off-by: mrcookie <athertonmook@gmail.com>

Make show-respawn-on-pickup default to true. If a net defines a respawn post, show-respawn-on-pickup will be set to false.

Signed-off-by: mrcookie <athertonmook@gmail.com>

Add XML option to where a flag will respawn at next

Signed-off-by: mrcookie
